title: LFT gold 2 and LFP
body:
hello, im currently gold 2 player, main jungle and top. can also play adc well and mid.
all round player, decent size champion pool. looking for a duo partner must be gold 3 or above.

also looking for a serious ranked 5's team. I am very active and on a lot. would love a team that plays 5's very frequently. add me ingame n1ghtmare

replies.body:
If you would be interested in looking into forming a team with me let me know.
Here is a link to my info:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/smxWnEHv-gold-1-junglertopmid-lft
